title: 03/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discovers a new trend and the secret to winning championships in professional sports. He also criticizes the Green Bay Packers for the conservative approach and why Aaron Rodgers deserves better. He shares his “Highs and Lows” for the quarterback prospects in this year’s NFL draft. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to tell Colin where Odell Beckham Jr. might be playing next season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
